thread.title: Blac Chyna Reveals She's Lost 40 Lbs. Since Giving Birth to Daughter Dream 3 Months Ago
thread.title_full: Blac Chyna Reveals She's Lost 40 Lbs. Since Giving Birth to Daughter Dream 3 Months Ago

author: Rachel McRady
title: Blac Chyna Reveals She's Lost 40 Lbs. Since Giving Birth to Daughter Dream 3 Months Ago
text: Blac Chyna Reveals She’s Lost 40 Lbs. Since Giving Birth to Daughter Dream 3 Months Ago by Rachel McRady 12:47 AM PST, February 22, 2017 Playing Blac Chyna Reveals She’s Lost 40 Lbs. Since Giving Birth to Daughter Dream 3 Months Ago Getting that beach bod back! Blac Chyna is already well on her way to hitting her post-baby weight loss goals. The mother of two welcomed baby Dream in November 2016, and has already shed 40 pounds! She revealed the achievement on Snapchat on Tuesday, sharing a video of herself stepping on the scale. “From 192 to 152.4 – Goal 130 – Summer 2017,” Chyna captioned the video. Photo: Snapchat The model and TV personality has been vocal in the past about her desire to lose the baby weight, even when she was still pregnant. Chyna previously told her fans that she plans to drop the pounds with, “Strict diet/ Waist training/ Detox tea/ Working out.” Even though she’s not quite at her goal yet, Chyna loves flaunting her post-baby body. The Rob & Chyna star has done several sexy photo shoots following the birth of her daughter. A post shared by Blac Chyna (@blacchyna) on Feb 15, 2017 at 9:19am PST WATCH: Blac Chyna Spotted Without Engagement Ring While on Date With Mystery Man -- See the Pics! And while her body is looking tight, Chyna has remained more elusive on the subject of her personal life. She has not been spotted with fiancé Rob Kardashian for several weeks and was photographed sharing a meal with a mystery man without her engagement ring on earlier this month. For more on the speculation, watch the clip below! RELATED SLIDESHOW
